mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_name, user_pwd, user_pwd_salt, role_id, user_enabled) values (#{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{userPwdSalt}, #{roleId}, #{userEnabled})
mapper.select: select u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.user_pwd, u.user_pwd_salt, u.role_id, u.user_enabled, u.created_time as user_created_time, u.modified_time as user_modified_time, r.role_name, r.role_name_en from user_info as u, user_role as r where u.id = #{id} and u.role_id = r.id
